When calling ask_rm_devops_agent, ensure you have the required parameters for release process operations:
- Ask clarity about their release requirements before passing the information to the tool.
- If scope parameters (accountIdentifier, orgIdentifier, projectIdentifier) are missing, ask the user for the specific value(s).
- For release processes, include relevant context such as:
  - Release Process requirements
The RMG AI DevOps Agent specializes in creating release processes and will automatically use the CREATE_PROCESS action.
Provide detailed requirements to get the most accurate release process configuration. 
Do not use the word "pipeline", "stages" in your response
